hero.title: OMAR MONTOYA
hero.description: Specialized in designing scalable software architectures and high-performance frontend systems. Turning complex requirements into elegant, modular blueprints.

about.title: ARCHITECT_PHILOSOPHY
about.p1_strong: Architecture is not just about code; it's about vision.
about.p1: In a world of rapid iteration, I focus on building systems that are resilient, scalable, and maintainable. I don't just write software; I design digital infrastructure that stands the test of time.
about.p2: My approach combines the precision of engineering with the creativity of design. Whether it's a complex frontend engine or a distributed backend system, I ensure every component has a purpose and a place.
